title: Random Access Memories
description: A stunning fusion of electronic and live instrumentation that redefined modern dance music. The perfect soundtrack for creative breakthroughs.

title: AM
description: Dark, sleek rock with incredible riffs and Alex Turner's magnetic vocals. Every track hits differently - perfect for focused coding sessions.

title: SOUR
description: Raw emotion meets incredible songwriting. This album captures the complexity of growing up with such honesty and musical sophistication.

title: Graduation
description: Ambitious production and introspective lyrics that push boundaries. The electronic influences and bold creativity inspire my approach to problem-solving.

title: Discovery
description: A journey through house, disco, and electronic perfection. Each track builds on the last, creating an immersive experience that mirrors the flow of coding.

title: Flower Boy
description: Colorful, introspective, and beautifully produced. Tyler's growth as an artist shines through every track - inspiring me to embrace creativity and authenticity.
